hero.subtitle: Vanige S.A.S. empowers companies with cutting-edge web development, data-driven marketing, and intelligent AI agents. We turn complex challenges into streamlined growth opportunities.

services.heading: Comprehensive Services
services.subtitle: From code to content, we provide end-to-end digital solutions designed to scale with your business.
services.desc_web: We build robust, scalable web applications using modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and Node.js. Our code is clean, maintainable, and optimized for performance.
services.desc_ai: Automate repetitive tasks and enhance customer support with intelligent AI agents. We implement LLMs and custom bots tailored to your business workflows.
services.desc_marketing: Drive organic traffic and improve your search rankings. Our data-driven approach ensures your brand reaches the right audience at the right time.
services.desc_mobile: Extend your reach with native and cross-platform mobile applications. We create seamless experiences for iOS and Android users.
services.desc_backend: Secure and scalable backend systems. We manage cloud infrastructure on AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure to ensure high availability.
services.desc_local_seo: Dominate your local market. We help local businesses optimize their online presence to attract nearby customers effectively.

about.title: About Vanige S.A.S.
about.lead: We are a forward-thinking technology partner dedicated to transforming businesses through digital innovation.
about.desc_1: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between complex technology and business growth, Vanige S.A.S. specializes in delivering high-impact web solutions, data-driven marketing strategies, and cutting-edge AI implementations.
about.desc_2: Our team consists of expert developers, creative strategists, and AI specialists who work collaboratively to ensure your digital presence is not just functional, but exceptional.
about.value_1_desc: We focus on measurable outcomes and ROI.
about.value_2_desc: Always exploring the latest in Tech & AI.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.desc: Ready to transform your business? Contact us via the form below or use the WhatsApp button for a quick chat.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.success: Thank you! We'll get back to you shortly.
